about_the_game: For the price of a match fee, you can now experience an accurate simulation of the competitive practical shooting sport. This VR experience allows you to participate in IPSC, USPSA, Pro-am and Steel Challenge matches within the comfort of your own home. It features accurate gun handling, common stage props such as swingers, movers, texas stars, polish plate rack, irish plate rack, movers and innovative stage designs.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes depiction of firearms in use to simulate the sport of practical shooting in a safe manner. It includes simulation of safety practices such as 180s and keeping the gun safe and clear when not in use.

detailed_description: For the price of a match fee, you can now experience an accurate simulation of the competitive practical shooting sport. This VR experience allows you to participate in IPSC, USPSA, Pro-am and Steel Challenge matches within the comfort of your own home. It features accurate gun handling, common stage props such as swingers, movers, texas stars, polish plate rack, irish plate rack, movers and innovative stage designs.

name: Practisim VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 980+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Windows 10 required for speech functions.

short_description: For the price of a match fee, you can now experience an accurate simulation of the competitive practical shooting sport. This VR experience allows you to participate in IPSC, USPSA, Pro-am and Steel Challenge matches within the comfort of your own home.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
